parameters.name: GeographicRegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the area that you want to query. Valid values:

*   **china**: the Chinese mainland
*   **asia-pacific**: Asia Pacific
*   **europe**: Europe
*   **north-america**: North America

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return per page. Default value: **10**. Valid values: **1** to **50**.
